text:
Commscope | Software Engineer | Onsite in Forest,Va | Full Time | Multiple levels and positions available

We are a small group of embedded linux engineers working on the first digital DAS(Distributed Antenna System). If you want to live in the country with a 20 or less minute commute and a great debt into income ratio Central Virginia is the place.

4 position are currently available:

Electrical Engineer https://jobs.commscope.com/job/Forest-Engineer%2C-Electrical...

Senior FPGA Engineer https://jobs.commscope.com/job/Forest-Senior-Engineer%2C-FPG...

Senior Software Engineer https://jobs.commscope.com/job/Forest-Senior-Software-Engine...

Software Engineer https://jobs.commscope.com/job/Forest-Software-Engineer-CC%2...

If you have any specific questions feel free to message me.
